articles.title: Viewing Malicious GIF In Microsoft Teams Could Allow Account Hijacking - Cyber Security News
articles.description: A wormable account hijacking vulnerability in Microsoft Teams could allow an adversary to takeover accounts by sending malicious .GIF files.
